text: Rhododendron rarum is a rhododendron species native to the Central and Bismarck Ranges of Papua New Guinea. It is a shrub with tubular, red flowers and narrowly elliptic leaves. == Synonyms == * None recorded. == References == * Bot. Jahrb. Syst. 55: 150 1918. * The Plant List * Hirsutum.com * Vireya.net rarum
title: Rhododendron rarum
